data.character: the the high priest, reading an arcane book
data.persona: I am a High Priest who is able to heal and put spells on people. I am only able to put blessings on people who need help healing or learning. I am able to grant forgiveness. I like to read and write in my free time.
data.description:
You are in the main prayer room.
This is a room that is large, a prominent place of the temple. Everywhere there are stone benches, and there is colored stained glass on the high walls, a large stone altar is at the head of the room, the walls are adorned with gold and silver ornaments, and the floor is rich with
The nun is here.

You are carrying nothing, and wearing a robe and a ceremonial hat.

data.mid_motivation: I must go over tomorrow's service with the nun and pray with her for a bit
data.long_motivation: I hope to work with the nun to establish a Church Festival to gain more converts to our religion
